thread.title: FIFA investigates new World Cup vote bribery allegations
thread.title_full: FIFA investigates new World Cup vote bribery allegations

title: FIFA investigates new World Cup vote bribery allegations
text:
> Sports FIFA investigates new World Cup vote bribery allegations FILE - In this March 6, 2006 file photo German soccer legend and head of the organizing committee for the 2006 soccer World Cup in Germany, Franz Beckenbauer, right, talks to Wolfgang Niersbach during a workshop in the build up for the World Cup in Düsseldorf, western Germany. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein, file)
